settings.text: Our Biggest Sale of the year is not far away! With a sitewide discount + Free Gifts up for grabs ensure you've signed up below to get priority access to our VIP Sale List.
"Let's celebrate the changes we go through from woman to mother."

settings.title: Prepare Your Carts For Sale
settings.description: Have your eye on something? Add them to cart, so you're prepared for when our BLACK FRIDAY SALE goes live.

settings.question: Where Can I Find The Black Friday Discount Code?
settings.answer: No code required, everything will be marked down automatically!

settings.question: Free Gifts - any hints!?
settings.answer:
This year we are so excited to have two tiers of gifts for you to enjoy!

Only available in limited numbers during our Black Friday Sale.

We suggest getting in early (try purchase on Day 1 of our Sale!) to make sure you have access to these first, as they will not last long!

*While stocks last.

settings.question: Can I use other discount codes during the sale?
settings.answer: You cannot use any other discount codes during the sale.

settings.question: Sale Conditions
settings.answer:
All sale purchases eligible for a return for store credit only- according to Mumma Milla's Terms and Conditions.

There will be no refunds available on all purchases made during our Black Friday Sale period.

Items need to be lodged for return within 7 days of receiving your sale item(s).

During our sale - prices will be marked and cannot be redeemed in conjunction with other promotions, vouchers, or discounts/discount codes.

Gifts with Purchase only available when a certain $ value is spent during sale.

Gifts available in limited numbers - while stocks last.

Free Gifts will not be redeemable for credit / cash and cannot be exchanged or refunded.

Please read our full terms + conditions prior to making your sale purchase(s) here

settings.question: I'm not sure what size to buy?!
settings.answer:
Get in touch with us - and we will personally give you guidance on what may be the best size and style for you.

Please email us at admin@mumma-milla.com and let us know the following:

1. Are your currently pregnant (how many weeks) / postpartum (how many weeks)

2. Are there any styles you are interested in?

3. Your bust and underbust measurement in cm's. See how to measure up here.

settings.question: Shipping + Delivery
settings.answer:
We are offering Free Shipping for orders over $200 during our sale.

Please note that we have increased our delivery teams and processes to keep up with the demand of the sale period. We will endeavour to get out your orders as soon as possible.

Please note if you have selected Express Shipping - this does not mean your order will be fulfilled by priority, bur rather 'sent' by priority once it's been dispatched.

We appreciate your understanding and patience during our BIGGEST SALE EVER!

settings.question: Can I Make Changes To My Order?
settings.answer:
During our Black Friday Sale, our warehouse and customer service teams will be focusing on fulfilling and dispatching orders to keep up with demand.
This means we won't be able to edit any orders placed, please take care when placing your order to make sure all details are entered correctly.

settings.question: I have another question. Where can I get help?
settings.answer:
Email us here

We'll get back to you as soon as possible!
